content:
A group, organisation, or race has wronged the character in the past, fuelling this animosity. When fighting opponents of that group in close combat, the character gains a +10 bonus to all Weapon Skill Tests made against them.

Talent Groups:Chaos Space Marines, Daemons, Mutants, Psykers, Xenos (specific), other
